attributes.action: set the minimum age for buying chocolate, sweets etc to 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Set minimum age for buying unhealthy foods such as chocolate, crisps and sweets to 16.
This would allow parents to control their children's diets by stopping them buying unhealthy foods from shops.
This could have a massive impact in stopping children spending their dinner money and pocket money on junk and tackling childhood obesity.
The food companies are getting children hooked on addictive and unhealthy foods.
This would give control back to the parents and allow them to feed their children a sensible amount of treats.
